created_by: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea), Vasiliy Burov (rule), oscd.community, Tim Shelton (fp)
name: Suspicious PowerShell Command Line
description: Detects the PowerShell command lines with special characters
query: (((((((process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*/) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*{.*{.*{.*{.*{.*/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*\^.*\^.*\^.*\^.*\^.*/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*`.*`.*`.*`.*`.*/)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Mm][Aa][Zz][Oo][Nn]\\[Ss][Ss][Mm]\\[Ss][Ss][Mm]\-[Dd][Oo][Cc][Uu][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt]\-[Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*{.*{.*{.*{.*{.*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Nn][Ee][Ww]\ [Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss][Oo][Uu][Rr][Cc][Ee]\(\"[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\.[Ss][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ee]\.[Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt]\".*/ OR /.*[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\ [Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ii][Cc]\ [Ee][Xx][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn]\ [Bb][Oo][Oo][Ll]\ [Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Ll][Aa][Mm][Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo]\([Ss][Aa][Ff][Ee][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee]\ [Hh][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ee]\);.*/)))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((((((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:/.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*/) OR (process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:/.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*/)) OR (process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:/.*{.*{.*{.*{.*{.*/)) OR (process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:/.*\^.*\^.*\^.*\^.*\^.*/)) OR (process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:/.*`.*`.*`.*`.*`.*/)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files\\Amazon\\SSM\\ssm\-document\-worker.exe))) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:/.*{.*{.*{.*{.*{.*/ AND process.command_line:(*new\ EventSource\(\"Microsoft.Windows.Sense.Client.Management\"* OR *public\ static\ extern\ bool\ InstallELAMCertificateInfo\(SafeFileHandle\ handle\);*)))))`
